channel.title: Need help
channel.description:
hey :D
ok listen, i made are server. good one with alot og thing to do and monster and stuff... but i use Hamachi?
can someone plz help me with no-ip? :)
if you help you get admin ( im just sayin )
if you can help me, pm me over moparscape or post here
thanks alot :rolleyes:
